name: vuepg
description: Vue2/3 通用式焦点管理工具

scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch
scripts.publish:premajor: npm run build && npm version premajor
scripts.publish:preminor: npm run build && npm version preminor
scripts.publish:prepatch: npm run build && npm version prepatch
scripts.publish:prerelease: npm run build && npm version prerelease

author: LemoFire
